notes: Implemented strict overlap detection (scale_factor=1e15). Verified baseline (candidate_000.csv) passes strict validation. Tried symmetric packing for small N - no improvement (baseline already optimal). Tried perturbed restarts with bbox3 - converged to worse local optima. The baseline is at a very strong local optimum that cannot be escaped by standard optimization techniques.
approaches_tried: Symmetric packing for N=1,2,4 - no improvement
Perturbed restarts with bbox3 - worse results
